attributes.action: Force social workers to protect 16 -18 year olds who have been sexually exploited
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current legislation for safeguarding children states that children up to the age of 18 are protected when there is evidence of exploitation.How is it that social workers repeatedly close the cases on these girls when they reach the age of 16.Someone has to take responsibility for their welfare,these girls NEED protection
